mapper.insert: insert into diary (diary_name, diary_text, is_deleted, user_id, diary_gmt_create, diary_gmt_modified) values (#{diaryName}, #{diaryText}, #{deleted}, #{userId}, #{diaryGmtCreate}, #{diaryGmtModified})
mapper.select: select (diary_id, diary_name, diary_text, user_id, diary_gmt_create, diary_gmt_modified) from diary where diary_name = #{diaryName} and is_deleted = '1'
SELECT diary_id, diary_name, diary_text, diary_gmt_create, diary_gmt_modified from diary where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = '1'
